title: Monday, Oct. 5: “When St. Francis Rebuilt the Church”
content:
Author Jon Sweeney discusses his book about the Pope. Students from St. Francis College will participate in the discussion. 

Where: St. Ann and the Holy Trinity Church • 157 Montague St. at Clinton Street 
 
When: 12:20 pm 

How much: Free 

Updated Sep. 25, 2
